title: Candidate Declines Offer
description: A candidate who received an offer has decided to decline it.

tasks.description: Receive the notification from the candidate that they are declining the offer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter is informed by the candidate.

tasks.description: Ask for the reason for the decline, if the candidate is willing to share.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter learns the candidate accepted a competing offer with a higher salary.

tasks.description: Update the candidate's status in the ATS to 'Offer Declined' and log the reason.
tasks.expected_outcome: Recruiter accurately updates the candidate's record in the ATS.
